original_text: I will hurl you and the mother who bore you into another country, where you were not born, and there you shall die.
korean_text: 내가 너와 너를 낳은 어머니를 너희가 나지 아니한 다른 지방으로 쫓아내리니 너희가 거기에서 죽으리라

sentences.original_text: I will hurl you and the mother who bore you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너와 너를 낳은 네 어미를
